channel.title: Compiler/Java Error
channel.description:
I just recently started coding again, but java doesn't seem to compile here is what I've got:
[code]This is the Compiler Code @echo off"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_22\bin\javac.exe" *.javapause[/code]
[code]CLASSPATH: .;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_22\bin;%CLASSPATH%;[/code]
[code]PATH: %SystemRoot%\system32;%SystemRoot%;%SystemRoot%\System32\Wbem;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_22\bin;[/code]
And I currently have Java 6 Update 22

item.title: Compiler/Java Error
item.dc:creator: @pobdol pobdol
item.description:
@pobdol wrote:

[quote=“crico11, post:2, topic:375856”]i am not sure what the error is but i can give you a code a for a good compiler?

@echo off title Compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit[/quote]

Thanks but all it did was flash

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler/Java Error
item.dc:creator: @crico11 crico11
item.description:
@crico11 wrote:

i am not sure what the error is but i can give you a code a for a good compiler?

@echo off title Compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit
